description: The ranking non-commissioned officer of the Earth Alliance warship Archangel, and one of the few survivors of the ship`s original crew. After the attack on Heliopolis, Neumann takes over as the ship`s pilot. Quiet and professional, he`s usually overshadowed by his charismatic superiors, but when the Archangel is locked down at the space fortress Artemis he takes charge and breaks the ship free.
name: Arnold Neumann
